reviews.review: Jó játék , csak sok a csaló.
O jogo e bem top, pena que o VAC (sistema anti-cheat a VALVE) e muito ruim, e nao esta barrando os cheaters.
system vac nie mogł zweryfikowac blr ble ble gram od roku i dzisij przestaje przerzucam sie na valorant elo. jebac sc go kidys był gi ale teraz jest gownem.
Jogo desde as antiguidades no mercado, dinamica do game muito foda, sem mais....

buy skins and you'll win its pay to win

Gra jest spoko ale po dodaniu jej jako ,,free to play" prawie się nie da grać na niższych rangach (przez cheaterów oraz smurfów), dlatego współczuję osobą które zaczynają swoją przygodę z counter strikiem. Jak dla mnie cs powinien być taki jak dawniej PŁATNY, mimo tego ją polecam, ale lepiej grać z jedną lub więcej osób które znamy i grają dosyć sporo dzięki czemu mogą nas czegoś nauczyć a o wiele łatwiej jest wyjść z takiego własnie silvera i golda  dzięki znajomymP.S gra jest łatwiejsza czasami na mg bo ludzie grają zazwyczaj tam normalnie.

This game is absolutely infested with cheaters. As a player who's played on and off since 2014, it's sad to see the current state this game is in. What blows my mind is how this game is still growing, and how many people still play it.This game can be a very fun high competitive experience, but with my personal experience of steam showing 12% of all players I've ever played with being VAC banned (you can check this yourself as well). Its unplayable.
Nem rossz de nem is tragikus.
Kanser Olmak İstiyorsanız Mükemmel Bir Oyun
this game is just like fortnite
Jogo muito bom porém cheio de hack
Es el counter amigo, imposible darle un dislike.

Jogabilidade boa. O problema são os participantes que não demonstram esportividade e fazem comentários chulos e ouvem musicas durante o jogo, sem consultar os demais participantes. Acredito também que existam jogadores chitados que tiram vantagem desta condição. Era isto por enquanto.

I played this game since 2016. The game itself is very good. I had lots of fun with this game, but Valve should have never made this game free to play. If I get a game nowadays with no hacks I know that something is wrong. Valve needs to sort out this problem as soon as possible, because the current anti-cheat is horrible. A new game that is attracting FPS gamers is Valorant and as soon as they get a South African Server I can guarantee that the player base of CS:GO will significantly drop.
Trop de cheater sur ce jeux !
